WorkItem.Description:
Hi, 
would be very useful to make the logo in ModernWindow clickable by Handling an icommand interface. 

I think on a shopping cart logo (enabled/disable it if cart is not empty) or it may be useful for login/logout purposes or even more to show user's profile data (I can put user's avatar into logodata).

Comments.Message: Has there been any progress on this? it would be a great addition :)
